intro: Hi, nice to meet you! So, you want to learn more about me, isn’t it? Well I’m a passionate of my work.
I usually program on iOS but I can also program for ReactJS or even Android. But the programming language I’m most experienced is Swift
I love sharing my knowledge to everyone and love discussing hours and hours about mobile development

jobs.title: iOS architect @ Openbank
jobs.description: Defining the architecture for a multi-bank application. The application is based on multiple frameworks that can serve for several banks at the same time.

jobs.title: Senior iOS developer @ Openbank
jobs.description: Developing onboarding and common modules for a multi-bank application. As part of the flow, OCR modules have been implemented to retrieve user’s personal information.

jobs.title: iOS developer @ Vodafone Spain
jobs.description: Developing billing flows on Mi Vodafone app and several commercial flows. Working on the integration of API rest services and push notification services.

jobs.title: Mobile developer @ NexStreaming Europe
jobs.description: Developling video player and immersive 360 navigation algorithms for large screen platforms.  Working with multiple streaming protocols like HLS and MPEG-Dash along  with several DRM protections.

jobs.title: Researcher @ UC3M
jobs.description: Validation, design and implementation of models for the analysis of the credibility of the information from social sources

jobs.title: Android developer @ Aplicaziones
jobs.description: Development of indoor positioning systems based on electromagnetic fields
